name: The Invincible Me Just Wants to Be Ordinary
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: After transmigrating to the world of immortal cultivation, Shui Wuyu discovered that he had an invincible ability, but he didn&#039t expect that once he used it, his lifespan would be consumed. In order to survive, Shui Wuyu decided to become a mortal. Howeverâ€¦ &quotI just want to be a mortal!! Why do you all want to mess with me!!!&quot &#92&#92Original Webtoon:&#92&#92 &#92AC.QQ&#92, &#92KuaiKan&#92, &#92IQIYI&#92
